items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Grilled bread with garlic, tomatoes, olive oil, and basil.

items.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Mushrooms filled with cream cheese and herbs.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with lemon butter sauce.

items.name: Ribeye Steak
items.description: Juicy ribeye steak served with mashed potatoes and green beans.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Classic cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and strawberry topping.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center.

reviews.comment: Amazing food and excellent service! Highly recommend the ribeye steak.
Great atmosphere and delicious desserts. The cheesecake is a must-try.
Great atmosphere and delicious desserts. The cheesecake is a must-try.
